attributes.action: Review the equality of child benefits recieved by parents from the state
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: parents without custody of their children (non resident parents) who can provide proof of child maintainance payments, regular contact with their children, and the required level of salary should be able to claim similar benefits under the same laws as those parents with full custody (resident parents). it is unjust and simply not right that non resident parents must struggle to survive and pay for their children when they take the same level of responsibility for that child as resident parents, but do not recieve the same level of support from the government.
